name: Fundación Centro Tecnolóxico de Telecomunicacións de Galicia
legal: Fundación privada sin ánimo de lucro
membership:
ECSO (European Cybersecurity Organisation)
AIOTI (Alliance for Internet of Things Innovation)
goal:
Our main goal is to contribute to the competitiveness and growth of the ICT industry in our region Galicia, Spain and the EU through excellence in research and technological development, and technology transfer.

Our main instruments to reach this goal are
- the implementation of research and innovation projects (individually, under contract with the industry or in cooperation with other entities),
- technology transfer,
- cooperation with Public Administrations in issues related to ICT technologies and the ICT sector,
- knowledge dissemination actions in the field of ICT
interests: Agriculture, Digital economy and society, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Innovation Union / Horizon2020
Digital Single Market / Digital Agenda for Europe
Cybersecurity
Regional Smart Specialisation Strategies
Common Agricultural Policy (Innovation)
